string.text: Faction Based Economy
Faction Economy
Faction discount multplier
Enables multiplier based on the relations of factions.
Goodwill multiplier
Enables multiplier based goodwill. (by default applies only for your faction)
Ignore faction for goodwill multiplier
Makes it so goodwill multiplier works for all factions.
Reputation multiplier
Enables multiplier based on actor reputation.
Higher prices at north
Makes it so prices at north are higher because of deficit.
Chance for extra item at player faction trader
Required goodwill level for other factions
Goodwill level at which traders from other factions begin selling faction gear.

Reputation price multiplier factor

Amount of normal ammo
Amount of special (AP, HP, slugs, darts etc.) ammo, that would be spawned in stock based on weapons sold by trader.
Amount of normal ammo, that would be spawned in stock based on weapons sold by trader.
Enable additional info in trade menu
Use special ammo spawns
Enables additonal info next to the trader portrait with info about current multiplier and supply lvl.
Enables special ammo spawn rules for traders. Instead of using trader files, ammo instead gets spawned based on sold weapons.

Attention stalkers: Duty is planning several raids on mutant lairs in the area. Volunteers and munitions are welcome: speak with Petrenko.
Heey stalkers, we're having a BLOWOUT sale!...oh shit, Lenka died in that last emission? Oh fuck, he owed me money... Well, anyway, swing by for great deals on some great gear!
Stalkers, this is Sidorovich. Wolf just helped me tidy up some deals with the boys in green, so we have a surplus of extra canned food. Come on down for a discount, today only!

To all stalkers currently under contract with the Science Divison: We have enough mutant samples - please do not bring any more. We have to start storing dog hearts in our food refrigerators. Thank you. - Professor Sakharov

To all stalkers currently under contract with the Science Divison: We are running low on artifact samples. Any samples remanded to us will be compensated for generously. Thank you. - Professor Sakharov
